nodes.text: Kaspas was a terrestrial ice world located in the galaxy. Some time after the Imperial Era, the scoundrel Misook backed out of a deal with a notorious crime boss on Kaspas and escaped to the Outer Rim planet Batuu, but was pursued by the bounty hunter Emim'Ai.
Kaspas was mentioned in "Chasing Ghosts," a short story written by George Mann and published in the book Myths & Fables in 2019.
